Summary: I took this picture with my smart phone and had this object show up.
divs: sighting detailsmy friend and i took a photo together at the boston waterfront. i held my phone out to try to get the shot and i immediately noticed the object but thought it was a plane. i didn't get a better look at it until later in the evening when i arrived home. i took a second photo right after this one and the object does not appear. i tried putting scraps of paper on the camera lens and taking a picture to reproduce the image with no luck. it was an overcast grey day and the wind was minimal. it doesn't look like a bag or piece of trash to me. if you have seen anything that looks like this or have any suggestions for me please let me know. thank you very much! *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg).
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Boston
There were no other sightings in Boston on or around March 23rd 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
